name: Doghouse Hopper
description:
Doghouse Hopper is a short jam game for the Trijam. This game was made in three hours, using the Unity engine, Blender and Inkscape.

All content and development was done exclusive for the jam except two sounds - see credits.

done in overtime
- webgl performance optimisation (15 min)


Team

Flod & Clode

Credits

Sound assets not created during the jam:

cc0 sound used from freesound.org
- 231762__davidmenke__fx-dog-barking by davidmenke
- 533034__evretro__8-bit-game-over-sound-tune by EVRetro
